greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that lcm(sigma(n+1), sigma(n)) = lcm(A000203(n+1), A000203(n)).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) t=1; for (n=1, 1000, s=sigma(n+1); write("b060781.txt", n, " ", lcm(s, t)); t=s) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 11 2009
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 26 2001
